af.content: Bloeddruk Monitering Volg sistoliese en diastoliese druk met AHA kategorie-klassifikasies Wat is Bloeddruk? Bloeddruk is die krag van bloed wat teen arterie-mure druk, gemeet in millimeters kwik (mmHg). Dit het twee komponente: Sistoliese druk - Die boonste getal, meet druk wanneer die hart klop (kontraheer) Diastoliese druk - Die onderste getal, meet druk wanneer die hart tussen kloppings rus Voorbeeld: 'n Lesing van 120/80 mmHg beteken 120 sistolies en 80 diastolies. en.title: App Store Metadata - Cardio Analytics
en.description: Monitor your cardiovascular health with Cardio Analytics: a comprehensive, privacy-first iOS app tracking 11 essential heart and mobility metrics.
en.content:
App Store Metadata App Name Cardio Analytics Subtitle Heart Health Tracking Description Monitor your cardiovascular health with Cardio Analytics - a comprehensive, privacy-first iOS app
            that tracks 11 essential heart health and mobility metrics from Apple HealthKit. Track heart rate, blood pressure, HRV, SpOâ‚‚, ECG, VOâ‚‚ Max, walking speed, and more.
            All data stays on your device with complete on-device processing. KEY FEATURES: 11 comprehensive cardiovascular and mobility

en.title: Blood Pressure Monitoring - AHA Categories & Trends
en.description: Monitor blood pressure with AHA classifications (Normal <120/80, Stage 1, Stage 2). Track systolic/diastolic trends and reduce cardiovascular risk.
en.content: Blood Pressure Monitoring Track systolic and diastolic pressure with AHA category classifications What is Blood Pressure? Blood pressure is the force of blood pushing against artery walls, measured in millimeters of mercury (mmHg). It has two components: Systolic pressure - The top number, measuring pressure when the heart beats (contracts) Diastolic pressure - The bottom number, measuring pressure when the heart rests between beats Example: A reading of 120/80 mmHg means 120 systolic and 80 dia

en.title: ECG & Atrial Fibrillation Detection - Apple Watch
en.description: Store FDA-cleared Apple Watch ECGs and track AF burden. Monitor irregular pulse alerts with 95% sensitivity for better heart health management.
en.content: ECG & Atrial Fibrillation Detection FDA-cleared Apple Watch ECG and AF burden tracking What are ECG and Atrial Fibrillation? ECG (Electrocardiogram) - Recording of the heart's electrical activity. Apple Watch provides single-lead ECG recordings. Atrial Fibrillation (AF) - Irregular heart rhythm where the atria quiver instead of contracting normally. Can increase stroke risk. Importance of ECG & Atrial Fibrillation Detection FDA-cleared Apple Watch ECG can detect atrial fibrillation with high acc

en.title: Cardio Analytics Features - Dashboard & Medication
en.description: Track 11 cardiovascular metrics with a personalized dashboard, medication adherence, evidence-based alerts, and symptom logging. Data stays on-device.
en.content: Cardio Analytics Features Complete cardiovascular health tracking with personalized dashboard, medication adherence, evidence-based alerts, and privacy by design Personalized Dashboard Track all 11 cardiovascular and mobility metrics in one unified view. See trends, compare against guideline ranges, and monitor changes at a glance. Resting and walking heart rate - Monitor cardiovascular status with normal range indicators (60-100 bpm) Blood pressure tracking - AHA category bands (Normal <120/80,

en.title: HealthKit Integration - Background Sync & Data
en.description: Comprehensive guide to Cardio Analytics HealthKit integration. 11 data types, anchored queries, and background delivery for seamless health tracking.
en.content: HealthKit Integration Complete technical reference for Cardio Analytics HealthKit data types and sync patterns HealthKit Data Types Used Cardio Analytics reads 11 cardiovascular and mobility metrics from Apple HealthKit using first-party identifiers: Heart Rate Metrics HKQuantityTypeIdentifier.heartRate - Current heart rate (counts/min) ( Apple Docs ) restingHeartRate - Resting heart rate baseline ( Apple Docs ) walkingHeartRateAverage - Average HR during walking Cardiovascular Metrics bloodPres

en.title: Heart Rate Tracking - Resting, Walking & Current HR
en.description: Track resting, walking, and current heart rate from Apple Watch. Understand normal ranges (60-100 bpm) and detect bradycardia with personalized thresholds.
en.content: Heart Rate Tracking Monitor resting, walking, and current heart rate for cardiovascular health assessment What is Heart Rate? Heart rate is the number of times your heart beats per minute (bpm). It's measured at different activity levels: Resting Heart Rate - Measured when completely at rest, ideally in the morning before getting out of bed Walking Heart Rate - Average heart rate during steady walking activity Current Heart Rate - Real-time measurement at any given moment Why Heart Rate Matters

en.title: How It Works - HealthKit Sync & Background Updates
en.description: Learn how Cardio Analytics syncs with Apple HealthKit for real-time data, background updates, and privacy-first on-device processing.
en.content: How Cardio Analytics Works Seamless HealthKit integration for automatic cardiovascular data sync with complete privacy and control HealthKit Sync Overview Cardio Analytics integrates with Apple HealthKit to automatically import and track 11 cardiovascular and mobility metrics. All data processing happens locally on your iPhone with no cloud uploads or external servers. 1 Authorize HealthKit Access Grant permission to read specific data types from Apple Health. You choose exactly which metrics to

en.title: Heart Rate Variability (HRV) - SDNN & RMSSD
en.description: Monitor HRV metrics (SDNN, RMSSD) to assess cardiovascular health and stress levels. Track nightly trends to improve your long-term health outcomes.
en.content: Heart Rate Variability (HRV) Monitor SDNN and RMSSD metrics to assess cardiovascular health and stress levels What is Heart Rate Variability? Heart Rate Variability (HRV) measures the variation in time between consecutive heartbeats. It's a marker of autonomic nervous system function and overall cardiovascular health. HRV Metrics: SDNN (Standard Deviation of NN intervals) - Measures overall HRV. Reflects total autonomic nervous system activity. RMSSD (Root Mean Square of Successive Differences)

en.title: Oxygen Saturation (SpO2) - Hypoxemia Detection
en.description: Track blood oxygen saturation (SpO2) from Apple Watch. Monitor hypoxemia risk with alerts for values below 90% and understand your respiratory health.
en.content: Oxygen Saturation (SpOâ‚‚) Monitor blood oxygen levels to assess respiratory and cardiovascular health What is Oxygen Saturation? Oxygen saturation (SpOâ‚‚) is the percentage of hemoglobin in your blood that's carrying oxygen. It's measured using pulse oximetry (typically via Apple Watch or dedicated devices). A reading of 98% SpOâ‚‚ means 98% of your hemoglobin molecules are saturated with oxygen. Why Oxygen Saturation Matters SpOâ‚‚ reflects how well your lungs are oxygenating blood and how effectivel

en.title: Stair Ascent Speed - Functional Capacity Tracking
en.description: Monitor stair ascent speed from Apple Watch to assess functional capacity and leg power. Detect meaningful mobility declines and track physical function.
en.content: Stair Ascent Speed Monitor functional capacity and leg power with stair climbing metrics What is Stair Ascent Speed? Stair ascent speed is the average speed you climb stairs, measured in meters per second (m/s). Apple Watch automatically records this metric when you climb stairs. Why Stair Ascent Speed Matters Stair climbing ability is a strong indicator of functional capacity and overall health: Reflects leg power - Requires strength, balance, and cardiovascular fitness Functional independence

en.description: Get help with Cardio Analytics. Frequently asked questions about VOâ‚‚ Max accuracy, AF detection, missing metrics, and more. Contact support.
en.content:

          measurement error compared to gold-standard indirect calorimetry ( PLOS ONE 2025 ). Cardio Analytics emphasizes trends and relative changes over time rather
          than absolute values. Focus on whether your VOâ‚‚ Max is impro

en.title: VO2 Max Tracking - Cardio Fitness & Mortality
en.description: Track VO2 Max trends from Apple Watch. Monitor this vital marker of cardiovascular fitness and mortality risk with evidence-based insights.
en.content: VOâ‚‚ Max Tracking Monitor cardio fitness and mortality risk marker What is VOâ‚‚ Max? VOâ‚‚ Max (maximal oxygen uptake) is the maximum amount of oxygen your body can use during intense exercise, measured in milliliters per kilogram of body weight per minute (mL/kg/min). It's considered the gold standard measure of aerobic fitness and cardiovascular capacity. Why VOâ‚‚ Max Matters VOâ‚‚ Max is a strong predictor of all-cause mortality - one of the most powerful markers of overall health and longevity: Hig

en.title: Walking Asymmetry - Gait Balance & Fall Risk
en.description: Track walking asymmetry to assess gait balance and fall risk. Apple Mobility metrics validated for professional-grade functional health monitoring.
en.content: Walking Asymmetry Assess gait balance and fall risk with Apple Mobility metrics What is Walking Asymmetry? Walking asymmetry is the percentage of time one foot's steps are faster or slower than the other foot. It measures gait imbalance and unevenness in walking patterns. Apple defines and validates walking asymmetry through iPhone Mobility metrics ( Apple Whitepaper PDF ). Why Walking Asymmetry Matters Higher walking asymmetry indicates gait imbalance and increased fall risk: Fall risk indicato

en.title: Walking Speed Tracking - The Sixth Vital Sign
en.description: Monitor walking speed as the sixth vital sign. Track gait quality trends to predict health outcomes and manage functional capacity effectively.
en.content: Walking Speed Tracking Monitor the "sixth vital sign" for functional capacity and health outcomes What is Walking Speed? Walking speed (also called gait speed) is the average speed you walk at a steady pace, measured in meters per second (m/s). Apple Watch and iPhone automatically measure walking speed during regular activity. Why Walking Speed Matters: The "Sixth Vital Sign" Walking speed is often called the "sixth vital sign" because it's such a powerful predictor of health outcomes ( JAMA 201

en.title: Weight & BMI Tracking - Healthy Range Monitoring
en.description: Track body weight and BMI with healthy range indicators. Monitor clinically relevant changes to manage your long-term cardiovascular health.
en.content: Weight & BMI Tracking Monitor body weight and body mass index for cardiovascular health What are Weight and BMI? Body Weight - Your total body mass in kilograms (kg) or pounds (lbs) BMI (Body Mass Index) - Weight-to-height ratio calculated as weight (kg) / heightÂ² (mÂ²) Example: A person weighing 70 kg at 1.75 m tall has a BMI of 70 / (1.75Â²) = 22.9 kg/mÂ² Why Weight and BMI Matter for Cardiovascular Health Excess weight increases cardiovascular disease risk Associated with hypertension, diabetes,

id.title: Pemantauan Tekanan Darah - Kategori & Tren AHA
id.description: Pantau tekanan darah dengan klasifikasi AHA (Normal <120/80, Tahap 1, Tahap 2). Lacak tren sistolik/diastolik dan kurangi risiko kardiovaskular.
id.content: Pemantauan Tekanan Darah Lacak tekanan darah sistolik dan diastolik dengan kategorisasi AHA untuk manajemen kesehatan kardiovaskular Apa Itu Tekanan Darah? Tekanan darah adalah kekuatan darah yang mendorong dinding arteri Anda saat jantung memompa darah. Ini diukur dalam milimeter air raksa (mmHg) dan dinyatakan sebagai dua angka: Tekanan sistolik (angka atas) - Tekanan di arteri Anda saat jantung berdetak Tekanan diastolik (angka bawah) - Tekanan di arteri Anda saat jantung istirahat di antara

id.title: Deteksi EKG & Fibrilasi Atrium - Apple Watch
id.description: Simpan EKG Apple Watch yang disetujui FDA dan lacak beban AF. Pantau peringatan denyut nadi tidak teratur dengan sensitivitas 95% untuk manajemen kesehatan jantung...
id.content: ECG & Fibrilasi Atrium Simpan rekaman ECG Apple Watch dan pantau notifikasi fibrilasi atrium Apa Itu Fibrilasi Atrium? Fibrilasi Atrium (AF atau AFib) adalah jenis aritmia jantung yang paling umum. Ini adalah denyut jantung tidak teratur dan sering cepat yang dapat meningkatkan risiko stroke, gagal jantung, dan komplikasi jantung lainnya. id.description: Lacak saturasi oksigen darah (SpO2) dari Apple Watch. Pantau risiko hipoksemia dengan peringatan nilai di bawah 90% dan pahami kesehatan pernapasan Anda.
id.content: Pemantauan Saturasi Oksigen (SpOâ‚‚) Pantau tingkat oksigen darah Anda untuk kesehatan pernapasan dan kardiovaskular Apa Itu Saturasi Oksigen? Saturasi Oksigen (SpOâ‚‚) mengukur persentase hemoglobin dalam darah Anda yang membawa oksigen. Ini adalah indikator kunci seberapa baik paru-paru Anda mentransfer oksigen ke dalam darah dan seberapa efisien jantung Anda memompa darah yang kaya oksigen ke seluruh tubuh Anda. id.content: Pemantauan VOâ‚‚ Max Lacak kapasitas aerobik Anda dan prediktor kuat risiko mortalitas Apa Itu VOâ‚‚ Max? VOâ‚‚ Max (konsumsi oksigen maksimum) adalah jumlah oksigen maksimum yang dapat digunakan tubuh Anda selama latihan intens. Ini dinyatakan dalam mililiter oksigen per kilogram berat badan per menit (ml/kg/menit). VOâ‚‚ Max adalah standar emas untuk kebugaran kardiorespirasi dan prediktor kuat kesehatan jangka panjang. Asimetri Berjalan mengukur perbedaan persentase dalam waktu saat setiap kaki bersentuhan dengan tanah saat berjalan. Gaya berjalan yang seimbang memiliki asimetri rendah, sementara asimetri tinggi dapat menunjukkan masalah dengan keseimbangan, kekuatan, atau mobilitas. Kecepatan berjalan adalah kecepatan Anda berjalan dengan kecepatan normal dan nyaman, biasanya diukur dalam meter per detik (m/detik). ms.title: Pemantauan Tekanan Darah - Kategori & Trend AHA
ms.description: Pantau tekanan darah dengan klasifikasi AHA (Normal <120/80, Peringkat 1, Peringkat 2). Jejaki aliran sistolik/diastolik dan kurangkan risiko kardiovaskular.
ms.content:
Pemantauan Tekanan Darah Jejak tekanan sistolik dan diastolik dengan klasifikasi kategori AHA Apakah itu Tekanan Darah? Tekanan darah adalah daya tolakan darah terhadap dinding arteri, diukur dalam milimeter merkuri (mmHg). Ia
      mempunyai dua komponen: Tekanan sistolik - Nombor atas, mengukur tekanan apabila jantung berdenyut (mengecut) Tekanan diastolik - Nombor bawah, mengukur tekanan apabila jantung berehat di antara denyutan Contoh: Bacaan 120/80 mmHg bermakna 120 sistolik dan 80 diastol

ms.title: Pengesanan ECG & Fibrilasi Atrium - Apple Watch
ms.description: Simpan ECG Apple Watch yang dibersihkan oleh FDA dan jejaki beban AF. Pantau amaran nadi yang tidak teratur dengan sensitiviti 95% untuk pengurusan kesihatan jantung...
ms.content:
ECG & Pengesanan Fibrilasi Atrium ECG Apple Watch yang diluluskan FDA dan penjejakan beban AF Apakah itu ECG dan Fibrilasi Atrium? ECG (Elektrokardiogram) - Rakaman aktiviti elektrik jantung. Apple Watch menyediakan rakaman
        ECG saluran tunggal. Fibrilasi Atrium (AF) - Irama jantung tidak teratur di mana atrium bergetar dan bukannya
        mengecut secara normal. Boleh meningkatkan risiko strok. Mengapa Pengesanan ECG dan AF Penting ECG Apple Watch yang diluluskan FDA boleh mengesan fibr

Kebolehubahan Kadar Jantung (HRV) Pantau metrik SDNN dan RMSSD untuk menilai kesihatan kardiovaskular dan tahap tekanan Apakah itu Kebolehubahan Kadar Jantung? Kebolehubahan Kadar Jantung (HRV) mengukur variasi masa antara denyutan jantung yang berturut-turut. Ia merupakan
      penanda fungsi sistem saraf autonomi dan kesihatan kardiovaskular keseluruhan. Metrik HRV: SDNN (Standard Deviation of NN intervals) - Mengukur HRV keseluruhan. Mencerminkan jumlah
        aktiviti sistem saraf autonomi.

ms.content:
Polisi Privasi Terakhir dikemas kini: Januari 2025 1. Pengenalan Selamat datang ke Cardio Analytics ("kami", atau "kita"). Privasi anda adalah asas kepada falsafah reka

ms.title: Ketepuan Oksigen (SpO2) - Pengesanan Hipoksemia
ms.description: Jejaki ketepuan oksigen darah (SpO2) daripada Apple Watch. Pantau risiko hipoksemia dengan amaran untuk nilai di bawah 90% dan fahami kesihatan pernafasan anda.
ms.content:
Ketepuan Oksigen (SpOâ‚‚) Pantau tahap oksigen darah untuk menilai kesihatan pernafasan dan kardiovaskular Apakah itu Ketepuan Oksigen? Ketepuan oksigen (SpOâ‚‚) adalah peratusan hemoglobin dalam darah anda yang membawa oksigen. Ia diukur menggunakan
      oksimetri nadi (biasanya melalui Apple Watch atau peranti khusus). Bacaan 98% SpOâ‚‚ bermakna 98% molekul hemoglobin anda tepu dengan oksigen. Mengapa Ketepuan Oksigen Penting SpOâ‚‚ mencerminkan sejauh mana paru-paru anda membekalkan oksigen kepada d

ms.title: Kelajuan Pendakian Tangga - Penjejakan Kapasiti Fungsian
ms.description: Pantau kelajuan pendakian tangga daripada Apple Watch untuk menilai kapasiti fungsian dan kuasa kaki. Kesan kemerosotan mobiliti yang bermakna dan jejaki fungsi fizikal.
ms.content:
Kelajuan Menaiki Tangga Pantau kapasiti fungsian dan daya kaki dengan metrik menaiki tangga Apakah itu Kelajuan Menaiki Tangga? Kelajuan menaiki tangga adalah kelajuan purata anda menaiki tangga, diukur dalam meter sesaat (m/s). Apple Watch
      merekodkan metrik ini secara automatik apabila anda menaiki tangga. Mengapa Kelajuan Menaiki Tangga Penting Keupayaan menaiki tangga adalah penunjuk kuat kapasiti fungsian dan kesihatan keseluruhan: Mencerminkan daya kaki - Memerlukan kekuatan, keseimba

ms.title: Sokongan & Soalan Lazim - Pusat Bantuan Cardio Analytics
ms.description: Dapatkan bantuan dengan Cardio Analytics. Soalan lazim tentang ketepatan VOâ‚‚ Max, pengesanan AF, metrik hilang dan banyak lagi. Hubungi sokongan.
ms.content:
Sokongan & Soalan Lazim Dapatkan bantuan dengan Cardio Analytics. Soalan lazim dan maklumat hubungan. Soalan Lazim Sejauh mana ketepatan VOâ‚‚ Max Apple Watch? VOâ‚‚ Max berasaskan pergelangan tangan adalah anggaran yang mungkin berbeza daripada ujian makmal. Kajian
          terbaru menunjukkan ralat pengukuran yang tidak remeh berbanding kalorimetri tidak langsung standard emas ( PLOS ONE 2025 ). Cardio Analytics menekankan aliran dan perubahan relatif dari masa ke
          masa berbanding nilai

ms.title: Terma dan Syarat - Analitis Kardio
ms.description: Terma dan Syarat Cardio Analytics. Semak syarat penggunaan, perjanjian pelesenan dan tanggungjawab pengguna kami untuk platform penjejakan kesihatan kami.

{# Terma dan Syarat - Malay #} Terma dan Syarat Terakhir dikemas kini: Januari 2024 Pengenalan Terma dan Syarat ini mengawal penggunaan laman web kami oleh anda. Dengan mengakses atau menggunakan

ms.title: Penjejakan VO2 Max - Kecergasan & Kematian Kardio
ms.description: Jejaki aliran VO2 Max daripada Apple Watch. Pantau penanda penting kecergasan kardiovaskular dan risiko kematian ini dengan cerapan berasaskan bukti.
ms.content:
Penjejakan VOâ‚‚ Max Pantau kecergasan kardio dan penanda risiko kematian Apakah itu VOâ‚‚ Max? VOâ‚‚ Max (pengambilan oksigen maksimum) adalah jumlah maksimum oksigen yang boleh digunakan oleh badan anda semasa
      senaman intensif, diukur dalam mililiter sekilogram berat badan seminit (mL/kg/min). Ia dianggap sebagai ukuran standard emas bagi kecergasan aerobik dan kapasiti kardiovaskular. Mengapa VOâ‚‚ Max Penting VOâ‚‚ Max adalah peramal kuat bagi kematian atas semua sebab - salah satu penanda kesih

ms.title: Berjalan Asimetri - Keseimbangan Berjalan & Risiko Jatuh
ms.description: Jejaki asimetri berjalan untuk menilai keseimbangan berjalan dan risiko jatuh. Metrik Mobiliti Apple disahkan untuk pemantauan kesihatan berfungsi gred profesional.
ms.content:
Asimetri Berjalan Nilai keseimbangan gaya berjalan dan risiko jatuh dengan metrik Mobiliti Apple Apakah itu Asimetri Berjalan? Asimetri berjalan adalah peratusan masa langkah satu kaki adalah lebih cepat atau lebih lambat daripada kaki yang
      satu lagi. Ia mengukur ketidakseimbangan gaya berjalan dan ketidakrataan dalam corak berjalan. Apple mentakrifkan dan mengesahkan asimetri berjalan melalui metrik Mobiliti iPhone ( PDF Kertas Putih Apple ). Mengapa Asimetri Berjalan Penting Asimetri ber

ms.title: Penjejakan Kelajuan Berjalan - Tanda Vital Keenam
ms.description: Pantau kelajuan berjalan sebagai tanda vital keenam. Jejaki trend kualiti gaya berjalan untuk meramalkan hasil kesihatan dan mengurus kapasiti fungsian dengan berkesan.
ms.content:
Penjejakan Kelajuan Berjalan Pantau "tanda vital keenam" untuk kapasiti fungsian dan hasil kesihatan Apakah itu Kelajuan Berjalan? Kelajuan berjalan (juga dipanggil kelajuan gaya berjalan) adalah kelajuan purata anda berjalan pada rentak yang
      stabil, diukur dalam meter sesaat (m/s). Apple Watch dan iPhone mengukur kelajuan berjalan secara automatik semasa
      aktiviti biasa. Mengapa Kelajuan Berjalan Penting: "Tanda Vital Keenam" Kelajuan berjalan sering dipanggil "tanda vital keenam" ke

ms.title: Penjejakan Berat & BMI - Pemantauan Julat Sihat
ms.description: Jejaki berat badan dan BMI dengan penunjuk julat yang sihat. Pantau perubahan yang berkaitan secara klinikal untuk mengurus kesihatan kardiovaskular jangka panjang anda.
ms.content:
Penjejakan Berat & BMI Pantau berat badan dan indeks jisim badan untuk kesihatan kardiovaskular Apakah itu Berat dan BMI? Berat Badan - Jumlah jisim badan anda dalam kilogram (kg) atau paun (lbs) BMI (Indeks Jisim Badan) - Nisbah berat-kepada-ketinggian yang dikira sebagai berat (kg) /

      kg/mÂ² Mengapa Berat dan BMI Penting untuk Kesihatan Kardiovaskular Berat berlebihan menin

Tahadhari zinazotegemea ushahidi, faragha kamili. Maelezo kamili ya App Store Cardio Analytics inakuwezesha kufuatilia afya yako ya mzunguko wa damu kwa ufuatiliaji kamili wa vipimo 11 vya msingi vya mzunguko wa damu na uhamaji kutoka Apple HealthKit. sw.title: Ufuatiliaji wa Shinikizo la Damu - Vitengo na Mienendo ya AHA
sw.description: Fuatilia shinikizo la damu na uainishaji wa AHA (Kawaida <120/80, Hatua ya 1, Hatua ya 2). Fuatilia mienendo ya systolic/diastoli na upunguze hatari ya moyo na mishipa.
sw.content: Ufuatiliaji wa shinikizo la damu Fuatilia shinikizo la systolic na diastolic na uainishaji wa kategoria za AHA Shinikizo la damu ni nini? Shinikizo la damu ni nguvu ya damu inayosukuma kuta za mishipa, inapimwa kwa millimeters ya mercury (mmHg). Ina sehemu mbili: Shinikizo la systolic - Nambari ya juu, inapima shinikizo moyo unapopiga (kusukuma) Shinikizo la diastolic - Nambari ya chini, inapima shinikizo moyo unapolala kati ya mapigo Mfano: Usomaji wa 120/80 mmHg unamaanisha 120 systolic na 80
keywords: ufuatiliaji wa shinikizo la juu la damu
kategoria za shinikizo la damu za AHA

sw.title: Utambuzi wa ECG na Atrial Fibrillation - Apple Watch
sw.description: Hifadhi ECG za Apple Watch zilizofutwa na FDA na ufuatilie mzigo wa AF. Fuatilia arifa za mapigo yasiyo ya kawaida kwa unyeti wa 95% kwa udhibiti bora wa afya ya moyo.
sw.content: ECG na atrial fibrillation ECG ya Apple Watch iliyoidhinishwa na FDA na ufuatiliaji wa mzigo wa atrial fibrillation ECG na atrial fibrillation ni nini? ECG (electrocardiogram) - Rekodi ya shughuli ya umeme ya moyo. Apple Watch inatoa rekodi za ECG za chaneli moja. Atrial fibrillation (AF) - Mapigo yasiyokuwa ya kawaida ya moyo ambapo atria zinapiga kwa haraka badala ya kusukuma kwa kawaida. Inaweza kuongeza hatari ya kiharusi. Kwa nini ECG na kugundua atrial fibrillation ni muhimu ECG ya Apple W
keywords: arifa za mapigo yasiyokuwa ya kawaida

sw.description: Fuatilia vipimo 11 vya mfumo wa moyo na mishipa ukitumia dashibodi iliyobinafsishwa, kufuata dawa, arifa zinazotegemea ushahidi, na ukataji wa dalili. Data itasalia...

Ona mwelekeo, linganisha na maeneo ya miongozo na fuatilia mabadiliko kwa mtazamo mmoja. sw.content: Ujumuishaji wa HealthKit Maelezo ya kiufundi ya jinsi Cardio Analytics inavyounganisha na Apple Health Ujumuishaji kamili wa HealthKit Cardio Analytics inatumia Apple HealthKit kwa usawazishaji kamili na kivya ufanisi wa data ya mzunguko wa damu na uhamaji. sw.title: Ufuatiliaji wa Mapigo ya Moyo - Kupumzika, Kutembea & Utumishi wa Sasa
sw.description: Fuatilia kupumzika, kutembea, na mapigo ya sasa ya moyo kutoka Apple Watch. Elewa masafa ya kawaida (60-100 bpm) na ugundue bradycardia na vizingiti vilivyobinafsishwa.
sw.content: Ufuatiliaji wa mapigo ya moyo Fuatilia mapigo ya moyo wakati wa kupumzika, kutembea na ya sasa kwa tathmini ya afya ya mzunguko wa damu Mapigo ya moyo ni nini? Mapigo ya moyo ni idadi ya mara moyo wako unavyopiga kwa dakika (mapigo kwa dakika). Inapimwa katika viwango tofauti vya shughuli: Mapigo ya moyo wakati wa kupumzika - Inapimwa unapokuwa umelala kabisa, bora asubuhi kabla ya kuamka kitandani Mapigo ya moyo wakati wa kutembea - Wastani wa mapigo ya moyo wakati wa shughuli ya kutembea kwa u

sw.title: Kueneza kwa Oksijeni (SpO2) - Utambuzi wa Hypoxemia
sw.description: Fuatilia mjao wa oksijeni katika damu (SpO2) kutoka Apple Watch. Fuatilia hatari ya hypoxemia kwa arifa za maadili yaliyo chini ya 90% na uelewe afya yako ya kupumua.
sw.content: Kiwango cha oksijeni (SpOâ‚‚) Fuatilia viwango vya oksijeni katika damu ili kutathmini afya ya kupumua na mzunguko wa damu Kiwango cha oksijeni ni nini? Kiwango cha oksijeni (SpOâ‚‚) ni asilimia ya hemoglobin katika damu yako inayobeba oksijeni. Inapimwa kwa kutumia pulse oximetry (kwa kawaida kupitia Apple Watch au vifaa maalum). Usomaji wa 98% SpOâ‚‚ unamaanisha kwamba 98% ya molekuli za hemoglobin zako zina oksijeni. Kwa nini kiwango cha oksijeni ni muhimu SpOâ‚‚ inaakisi jinsi mapafu yako yanavyowek

sw.title: Kasi ya Kupanda Ngazi - Ufuatiliaji wa Uwezo wa Utendaji
sw.description: Fuatilia kasi ya kupanda ngazi kutoka Apple Watch ili kutathmini uwezo wa kufanya kazi na nguvu ya mguu. Tambua kupungua kwa uhamaji na ufuatilie utendaji wa kawaida.
sw.content: Kasi ya kupanda ngazi Fuatilia uwezo wa kazi na nguvu za miguu Kasi ya kupanda ngazi ni nini? Kasi ya kupanda ngazi inapima kasi yako ya wastani ya kupanda ngazi, inapimwa kwa mita kwa sekunde (m/s). Inapatikana katika Apple Mobility Metrics (iPhone 8+ na iOS 14+). Kupanda ngazi kunahitaji nguvu za miguu, usawaziko, uwezo wa mzunguko wa damu na kujielekeza - kwa hivyo ni kiashiria kikubwa cha afya ya kazi. sw.content: Ufuatiliaji wa VOâ‚‚ Max Fuatilia uwezo wa mzunguko wa damu na kiashiria cha hatari ya kifo VOâ‚‚ Max ni nini? VOâ‚‚ Max (upeo wa kupata oksijeni) ni kiasi kikubwa cha oksijeni mwili wako unaweza kutumia wakati wa mazoezi makali, inapimwa kwa milliliters kwa kilogramu ya uzito wa mwili kwa dakika (mL/kg/min). Inachukuliwa kama kiwango cha dhahabu cha uwezo wa aerobic na uwezo wa mzunguko wa damu. sw.description: Fuatilia ulinganifu wa kutembea ili kutathmini usawa wa mwendo na hatari ya kuanguka. Vipimo vya Apple Mobility vimeidhinishwa kwa ufuatiliaji wa afya ya utendaji wa...
sw.content: Usawa wa kutembea Tathmini usawaziko wa kutembea na hatari ya kuanguka Usawa wa kutembea ni nini? Usawa wa kutembea inapima tofauti kati ya hatua za mguu wa kulia na kushoto, ikionyeshwa kama asilimia. Inapatikana katika Apple Mobility Metrics (iPhone 8+ na iOS 14+). Usawa wa juu unaonyesha mwendo usio wa usawa wa kutembea, ambao unaweza kuonyesha majeraha ya mguu, matatizo ya usawaziko, au udhaifu wa misuli. sw.title: Ufuatiliaji wa Kasi ya Kutembea - Ishara ya Sita Muhimu
sw.description: Fuatilia kasi ya kutembea kama ishara muhimu ya sita. Fuatilia mwelekeo wa ubora wa mwendo ili kutabiri matokeo ya afya na kudhibiti uwezo wa utendaji kazi kwa ufanisi.
sw.content: Kasi ya kutembea Fuatilia "kiashiria cha sita cha muhimu" cha afya ya kazi Kasi ya kutembea ni nini? Kasi ya kutembea ni kasi yako ya wastani ya kutembea, inapimwa kwa mita kwa sekunde (m/s). Apple Watch inaelekeza kasi ya kutembea wakati wa mwendo wa kawaida wa kutembea. Kasi ya kutembea inachukuliwa kama "kiashiria cha sita cha muhimu" - kiashiria kikubwa cha afya ya jumla na kazi. tl.title: Pagsubaybay sa Presyon ng Dugo - Mga Kategorya at Trend ng AHA
tl.description: Subaybayan ang presyon ng dugo gamit ang mga klasipikasyon ng AHA (Normal <120/80, Stage 1, Stage 2). Subaybayan ang systolic/diastolic trend at bawasan ang...
tl.content: Pagsubaybay sa Presyon ng Dugo Subaybayan ang systolic at diastolic blood pressure na may AHA category classifications para sa hypertension risk assessment Ano ang Presyon ng Dugo? Ang presyon ng dugo ay ang lakas ng dugo na tumatama sa mga dingding ng inyong mga arterya. Sinusukat ito sa dalawang numero: Systolic Pressure (Itaas na numero) - Ang presyon kapag ang puso ay pumipintig at nag-push ng dugo sa mga arterya Diastolic Pressure (Ibabang numero) - Ang presyon kapag ang puso ay nagpapahing

tl.title: ECG at Atrial Fibrillation Detection - Apple Watch
tl.description: Mag-imbak ng mga Apple Watch na na-clear ng FDA na ECG at subaybayan ang AF na pasanin. Subaybayan ang mga irregular pulse alert na may 95% sensitivity para sa mas...
tl.content: ECG at Atrial Fibrillation Mag-imbak ng FDA-approved Apple Watch ECG recordings at subaybayan ang atrial fibrillation burden Ano ang ECG at Atrial Fibrillation? Electrocardiogram (ECG o EKG) ay nagre-record ng electrical activity ng puso. Ang Apple Watch ay maaaring kumuha ng single-lead ECG gamit ang Digital Crown at back crystal. Atrial Fibrillation (AFib) ay ang pinakakaraniwang cardiac arrhythmia, na nag-aaffect ng 2-6 million Americans. Ang puso ay tumitibok nang irregular at kadalasang mas

Tingnan ang mga uso, ikumpara laban sa mga guideline ranges at subaybayan ang mga pagbabago sa isang sulyap. Pahinga at Paglakad na Tibok ng Puso - Subaybayan ang kardyobaskular na katayuan

tl.title: Pagsubaybay sa Rate ng Puso - Pagpapahinga, Paglalakad at...
tl.description: Subaybayan ang pagpapahinga, paglalakad, at kasalukuyang tibok ng puso mula sa Apple Watch. Unawain ang mga normal na hanay (60-100 bpm) at tuklasin ang bradycardia...
tl.content: Pagsubaybay sa Tibok ng Puso Subaybayan ang pahinga, paglakad at kasalukuyang tibok ng puso para sa pagtasa ng kardyobaskular na kalusugan Ano ang Tibok ng Puso? Ang tibok ng puso ay ang bilang ng beses na tumitibok ang inyong puso bawat minuto (tibok/min). Sinusukat ito sa iba't ibang antas ng aktibidad: Resting Heart Rate - Sinusukat kapag kayo ay ganap na nagpapahinga, pinakamabuti sa umaga bago bumangon sa kama Walking Heart Rate - Average na tibok ng puso sa panahon ng steady walking activi

tl.title: Paano Ito Gumagana - HealthKit Sync at Mga Update sa Background
tl.description: Matutunan kung paano nagsi-sync ang Cardio Analytics sa Apple HealthKit para sa real-time na data, mga update sa background, at pagpoproseso sa device na una sa privacy.
tl.content: Paano Gumagana ang Cardio Analytics Walang putol na pag-sync sa Apple HealthKit para sa real-time na kardyobaskular na pagsubaybay, background updates at write-back capabilities HealthKit Integration Overview Ang Cardio Analytics ay gumagamit ng Apple HealthKit upang magbasa at magsulat ng kardyobaskular at mobilidad na datos. Ang lahat ng datos ay nananatiling lokal sa inyong iPhone - walang cloud storage, walang external servers, walang kinakailangang account. Mga First-Party Data Types Gumaga

tl.title: Pagkakaiba-iba ng Bilis ng Puso (HRV) - SDNN at RMSSD
tl.description: Subaybayan ang mga sukatan ng HRV (SDNN, RMSSD) upang masuri ang kalusugan ng cardiovascular at mga antas ng stress. Subaybayan ang gabi-gabing mga uso upang mapabuti...
tl.content: Pagkakaiba-iba ng Tibok ng Puso (HRV) Subaybayan ang SDNN at RMSSD na mga sukatan upang tasahin ang kardyobaskular na kalusugan at mga antas ng stress Ano ang Pagkakaiba-iba ng Tibok ng Puso? Ang Pagkakaiba-iba ng Tibok ng Puso (HRV) ay sumusukat sa variation sa oras sa pagitan ng magkakasunod na tibok ng puso. Ito ay isang marker ng autonomic nervous system function at pangkalahatang kardyobaskular na kalusugan. Mga Sukatan ng HRV: SDNN (Standard Deviation of NN intervals) - Sumusukat ng pangka

tl.content: Saturasyon ng Oksihena (SpOâ‚‚) Subaybayan ang mga antas ng blood oxygen saturation para sa respiratory at kardyobaskular na pagtasa ng kalusugan Ano ang Saturasyon ng Oksihena? Ang Saturasyon ng Oksihena (SpOâ‚‚) ay sumusukat sa porsyento ng hemoglobin sa dugo na may oxygen. Ito ay sinusukat gamit ang pulse oximetry, isang non-invasive na paraan na gumagamit ng light absorption. Ang normal na SpOâ‚‚ levels sa mga malusog na indibidwal ay 95-100%. tl.content: Bilis sa Pag-akyat ng Hagdan Subaybayan ang functional capacity at lakas ng binti sa pamamagitan ng stair descent/ascent speed Ano ang Bilis sa Pag-akyat ng Hagdan? Ang stair speed ay sumusukat sa gaano kabilis kayo umakyat o bumaba ng mga hagdan, ipinapahayag sa meters bawat segundo (m/s). Ang Apple ay pangunahing nag-track ng stair descent speed (bumaba) dahil ito ay mas predictive ng functional decline at fall risk. Ang normal na stair descent speed ay 0.7-0.9 m/s. tl.title: Pagsubaybay sa VO2 Max - Cardio Fitness at Mortality
tl.description: Subaybayan ang mga trend ng VO2 Max mula sa Apple Watch. Subaybayan itong mahalagang marker ng cardiovascular fitness at mortality risk na may mga insight na batay sa...
tl.content: VOâ‚‚ Max - Kardyobaskular na Fitness Subaybayan ang inyong cardiorespiratory fitness at mortality risk marker Ano ang VOâ‚‚ Max? VOâ‚‚ Max (Maximum Oxygen Uptake) ay sumusukat sa maximum na dami ng oxygen na magagamit ng katawan sa panahon ng intense exercise. Ito ay ipinapahayag sa milliliters ng oxygen bawat kilogram ng body weight bawat minuto (ml/kg/min). Ang VOâ‚‚ Max ay ang "gold standard" measurement ng cardiorespiratory fitness at isa sa pinakamalakas na predictors ng long-term health at mortal

tl.title: Walking Asymmetry - Balanse sa Paglakad at Panganib sa Pagkahulog
tl.description: Subaybayan ang walking asymmetry upang masuri ang balanse ng lakad at panganib na mahulog. Ang mga sukatan ng Apple Mobility ay napatunayan para sa propesyonal na...
tl.content: Asymmetry ng Paglakad Tasahin ang balanse ng lakad at panganib ng pagkahulog gamit ang validated Apple Mobility metrics Ano ang Asymmetry ng Paglakad? Ang walking asymmetry ay sumusukat sa pagkakaiba sa walking pattern sa pagitan ng kaliwa at kanang bahagi ng katawan. Ito ay ipinapahayag bilang porsyento - ang mas mataas na porsyento ay nangangahulugang mas malaking asymmetry. Ang normal na walking asymmetry ay karaniwang <5%. Ang mga halaga na >10% ay maaaring mag-indicate ng gait abnormalities

tl.content: Bilis ng Paglakad Subaybayan ang "ikaanim na vital sign" para sa functional health at mobility assessment Ano ang Bilis ng Paglakad? Ang bilis ng paglakad ay sumusukat sa gaano kabilis kayo naglalakad, karaniwang ipinapahayag sa meters bawat segundo (m/s) o kilometers bawat oras (km/h). Ito ay kinikilala bilang "ikaanim na vital sign" dahil sa malakas na predictive value para sa health outcomes. Ang normal na comfortable walking speed para sa mga matatanda ay 1.2-1.4 m/s. Body Mass Index (BMI) ay isang measurement ng body fat batay sa taas at timbang.
